name: colyseus-lobby-mono
description: component for a react lobby for colyseus multiplayer, client and server package

scripts.install-all: npm run client:install && npm run server:install
scripts.start-all:dev: concurrently \"npm run --prefix server start:dev\" \"npm run --prefix tests/client dev\"
scripts.components:build: npm --prefix components/lobby/client run build && npm --prefix components/lobby/server run build
